name: Sprite Monkey Project
summary: Learn about .SMPF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Sprite images contained in the SMPF file are commonly used to create images for video game characters or objects. They are also used for buttons or symbols on webpages or programs.

description: SMPF file is a compressed project file format utilized by Sprite Monkey, a lightweight application designed for efficient editing of sprite images. These files store both the sprite images themselves and the corresponding coordinate information specified within the userâ€™s project.

Compressed project file used by Sprite Monkey, a lightweight application that allows users to quickly edit sprite images; contains sprite images and coordinate information specified in the user's project.
